long_description: Indulge in a delicious cup of Starbucks Gourmet hot cocoa the next time you're camped in the woods or kicking back by the fireplace at home. Simply mix the contents of the packet with 8 fl. oz. of hot water and enjoy! Made from high-quality Dutch cocoa. Each 1.25 oz. packet makes a creamy 8 oz. cup of Starbucks Gourmet hot cocoa. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Indulge in a delicious cup of Starbucks Gourmet hot cocoa the next time you're camped in the woods or kicking back by the fireplace at home.
